@soumith Once I get the graph, I notice that I can get access to the Nodes and Inputs (I assume they are Nodes containing weights, including the input tensor).
I want to get access to the weights inside the nodes, but I cannot find any instructions related to get the weight values into python.

body:
@soumith  Once I get the graph, I notice that I can get access to the Nodes and Inputs (I assume they are Nodes containing weights, including the input tensor).
I want to get access to the weights inside the nodes, but I cannot find any instructions related to get the weight values into python.
